entry.title: UCB Algorithm
entry.content:
算法

UCBi(t−1,δ)={∞ if Ti(t−1)=0μ^i(t−1)+2log⁡(1/δ)Ti(t−1) otherwise \mathrm{UCB}_{i}(t-1, \delta)= \begin{cases}\infty & \text { if } T_{i}(t-1)=0 \\ \hat{\mu}_{i}(t-1)+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{T_{i}(t-1)}} & \text { otherwise }\end{cases} UCBi​(t−1,δ)={∞μ^​i​(t−1)+Ti​(t−1)2log(1/δ)​​​ if Ti​(t−1)=0 otherwise ​

At=argmaxi UCBi(t−1,δ)A_{t}= \text{argmax}_{i}~\mathrm{UCB}_{i}(t-1, \delta) At​=argmaxi​ UCBi​(t−1,δ)

当 μ^i(t−1)\hat{\mu}_{i}(t-1)μ^​i​(t−1)很大或 Ti(t−1)T_{i}(t-1)Ti​(t−1)很小时，算法在直觉上都能满足

引理一

P(μ⩾μ^+2log⁡(1/δ)n)⩽δ for all δ∈(0,1)\mathbb{P}\left(\mu \geqslant \hat{\mu}+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{n}}\right) \leqslant \delta \quad \text { for all } \delta \in(0,1) P(μ⩾μ^​+n2log(1/δ)​​)⩽δ for all δ∈(0,1)

对于 Xi−μX_{i}-\muXi​−μ服从 σ−subgaussian\sigma-\text{subgaussian}σ−subgaussian分布

P(μ^⩾μ+ϵ)⩽e−nϵ22σ2 and P(μ^⩽μ−ϵ)⩽e−nϵ22σ2\mathbb{P}(\hat{\mu}\geqslant \mu+\epsilon)\leqslant e^{-\frac{n\epsilon^2}{2\sigma^2}} \quad \text { and } \quad \mathbb{P}(\hat{\mu}\leqslant \mu-\epsilon)\leqslant e^{-\frac{n\epsilon^2}{2\sigma^2}} P(μ^​⩾μ+ϵ)⩽e−2σ2nϵ2​ and P(μ^​⩽μ−ϵ)⩽e−2σ2nϵ2​

（详见ETC算法的引理三证明）

对于上式，令 δ=e−nϵ22σ2\delta=e^{-\frac{n\epsilon^2}{2\sigma^2}}δ=e−2σ2nϵ2​，则 ϵ=2log⁡(1/δ)n\epsilon=\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{n}}ϵ=n2log(1/δ)​​

Regret分析

假设 μ1=μ∗\mu_{1}=\mu^{*}μ1​=μ∗

Rn=∑i=1kΔiE[Ti(n)]R_{n}=\sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] Rn​=i=1∑k​Δi​E[Ti​(n)]

设定 GiG_{i}Gi​为一个“好事件”

Gi={μ1<min⁡t∈[n]UCB1(t,δ)}∩{μ^iui+2uilog⁡(1δ)<μ1}G_{i}=\left\{\mu_{1}<\min _{t \in[n]} \mathrm{UCB}_{1}(t, \delta)\right\} \cap\left\{\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}+\sqrt{\frac{2}{u_{i}} \log \left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)}<\mu_{1}\right\} Gi​={μ1​<t∈[n]min​UCB1​(t,δ)}∩{μ^​iui​​+ui​2​log(δ1​)​<μ1​}

可以得到“好事件”发生的两个性质

Ti(n)⩽uiT_{i}(n) \leqslant u_{i} Ti​(n)⩽ui​

假设在时刻 ttt，满足 Ti(t−1)=uiT_{i}(t-1) = u_{i}Ti​(t−1)=ui​和 At=iA_{t}=iAt​=i

UCB⁡i(t−1,δ)=μ^i(t−1)+2log⁡(1/δ)Ti(t−1)=μ^iui+2log⁡(1/δ)ui<μ1<UCB1(t−1,δ)\begin{aligned} \operatorname{UCB}_{i}(t-1, \delta) &=\hat{\mu}_{i}(t-1)+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{T_{i}(t-1)}} \\ &=\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{u_{i}}} \\ &<\mu_{1} \\ &<\mathrm{UCB}_{1}(t-1, \delta) \end{aligned} UCBi​(t−1,δ)​=μ^​i​(t−1)+Ti​(t−1)2log(1/δ)​​=μ^​iui​​+ui​2log(1/δ)​​<μ1​<UCB1​(t−1,δ)​

故 At=argmax⁡jUCBj(t−1,δ)≠iA_{t}=\operatorname{argmax}_{j} \mathrm{UCB}_{j}(t-1, \delta) \neq iAt​=argmaxj​UCBj​(t−1,δ)​=i

以及

Gic 为小概率事件G_{i}^{c} \text{ 为小概率事件} Gic​ 为小概率事件

Gic={μ1⩾min⁡t∈[n]UCB1(t,δ)}∪{μ^iui+2uilog⁡(1δ)⩾μ1}G_{i}^{c}=\left\{\mu_{1}\geqslant\min _{t \in[n]} \mathrm{UCB}_{1}(t, \delta)\right\} \cup\left\{\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}+\sqrt{\frac{2}{u_{i}} \log \left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)}\geqslant\mu_{1}\right\} Gic​={μ1​⩾t∈[n]min​UCB1​(t,δ)}∪{μ^​iui​​+ui​2​log(δ1​)​⩾μ1​}

对于左式

P(μ1⩾min⁡t∈[n]UCB1(t,δ))⩽P(⋃s∈[n]{μ1⩾μ^1s+2log⁡(1/δ)s})⩽∑s=1nP(μ1⩾μ^1s+2log⁡(1/δ)s)⩽nδ\begin{aligned} \mathbb{P}\left(\mu_{1} \geqslant \min _{t \in[n]} \mathrm{UCB}_{1}(t, \delta)\right) & \leqslant \mathbb{P}\left(\bigcup_{s \in[n]}\left\{\mu_{1} \geqslant \hat{\mu}_{1 s}+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{s}}\right\}\right) \\ & \leqslant \sum_{s=1}^{n} \mathbb{P}\left(\mu_{1} \geqslant \hat{\mu}_{1 s}+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{s}}\right) \\ & \leqslant n \delta \end{aligned} P(μ1​⩾t∈[n]min​UCB1​(t,δ))​⩽P⎝⎛​s∈[n]⋃​{μ1​⩾μ^​1s​+s2log(1/δ)​​}⎠⎞​⩽s=1∑n​P(μ1​⩾μ^​1s​+s2log(1/δ)​​)⩽nδ​

对于右式，μ1−μi=Δi\mu_{1}-\mu_{i}=\Delta_{i}μ1​−μi​=Δi​

P(μ^iui+2log⁡(1/δ)ui⩾μ1)=P(μ^iui−μi⩾Δi−2log⁡(1/δ)ui)⩽P(μ^iui−μi⩾cΔi)⩽exp⁡(−uic2Δi22)\begin{aligned} \mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}+\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{u_{i}}} \geqslant \mu_{1}\right) &=\mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}-\mu_{i} \geqslant \Delta_{i}-\sqrt{\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{u_{i}}}\right) \\ & \leqslant \mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i u_{i}}-\mu_{i} \geqslant c \Delta_{i}\right) \\ & \leqslant \exp \left(-\frac{u_{i} c^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}{2}\right) \end{aligned} P⎝⎛​μ^​iui​​+ui​2log(1/δ)​​⩾μ1​⎠⎞​​=P⎝⎛​μ^​iui​​−μi​⩾Δi​−ui​2log(1/δ)​​⎠⎞​⩽P(μ^​iui​​−μi​⩾cΔi​)⩽exp(−2ui​c2Δi2​​)​

注意 0<c<10<c<10<c<1

对于最后一步，X∼σ-subgaussianX\sim \sigma\text{-subgaussian}X∼σ-subgaussian

P(X⩾ε)⩽exp⁡(−ε22σ2)\mathbb{P}(X \geqslant \varepsilon) \leqslant \exp \left(-\frac{\varepsilon^{2}}{2 \sigma^{2}}\right) P(X⩾ε)⩽exp(−2σ2ε2​)

结合起来可得

P(Gic)≤nδ+exp⁡(−uic2Δi22)\mathbb{P}\left(G_{i}^{c}\right) \leq n \delta+\exp \left(-\frac{u_{i} c^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}{2}\right) P(Gic​)≤nδ+exp(−2ui​c2Δi2​​)

根据“好事情”的两个性质，我们可以得到

E[Ti(n)]⩽E[I{Gi}Ti(n)]+E[I{Gic}Ti(n)]⩽ui+n(nδ+exp⁡(−uic2Δi22))\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] &\leqslant \mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{I}\{G_{i}\}T_{i}(n)\right]+\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{I}\{G_{i}^{c}\}T_{i}(n)\right]\\ & \leqslant u_{i}+n\left(n \delta+\exp \left(-\frac{u_{i} c^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}{2}\right)\right) \end{aligned} E[Ti​(n)]​⩽E[I{Gi​}Ti​(n)]+E[I{Gic​}Ti​(n)]⩽ui​+n(nδ+exp(−2ui​c2Δi2​​))​

不妨取 ui=⌈2log⁡(1/δ)(1−c)2Δi2⌉u_{i}=\left\lceil\frac{2 \log (1 / \delta)}{(1-c)^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}\right\rceilui​=⌈(1−c)2Δi2​2log(1/δ)​⌉， δ=1/n2\delta=1 / n^{2}δ=1/n2 以及 c=1/2c=1 / 2c=1/2

E[Ti(n)]⩽ui+n(nδ+exp⁡(−uic2Δi22))⩽ui+1+n1−2c2/(1−c)2=⌈2log⁡(n2)(1−c)2Δi2⌉+1+n1−2c2/(1−c)2⩽3+16log⁡(n)Δi2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] & \leqslant u_{i}+n\left(n \delta+\exp \left(-\frac{u_{i} c^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}{2}\right)\right) \\ & \leqslant u_{i}+1+n^{1-2 c^{2} /(1-c)^{2}}=\left\lceil\frac{2 \log \left(n^{2}\right)}{(1-c)^{2} \Delta_{i}^{2}}\right\rceil+1+n^{1-2 c^{2} /(1-c)^{2}} \\ & \leqslant 3+ \frac{16 \log \left(n\right)}{\Delta_{i}^{2}} \end{aligned} E[Ti​(n)]​⩽ui​+n(nδ+exp(−2ui​c2Δi2​​))⩽ui​+1+n1−2c2/(1−c)2=⌈(1−c)2Δi2​2log(n2)​⌉+1+n1−2c2/(1−c)2⩽3+Δi2​16log(n)​​

Regret的上界为

Rn=∑i=1kΔiE[Ti(n)]=∑i:Δi<ΔΔiE[Ti(n)]+∑i:Δi⩾ΔΔiE[Ti(n)]⩽nΔ+∑i:Δi⩾Δ(3Δi+16log⁡(n)Δi)⩽nΔ+16klog⁡(n)Δ+3∑iΔi⩽8nklog⁡(n)+3∑i=1kΔi,\begin{aligned} R_{n} &=\sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right]=\sum_{i: \Delta_{i}<\Delta} \Delta_{i} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right]+\sum_{i: \Delta_{i} \geqslant \Delta} \Delta_{i} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] \\ & \leqslant n \Delta+\sum_{i: \Delta_{i} \geqslant \Delta}\left(3 \Delta_{i}+\frac{16 \log (n)}{\Delta_{i}}\right) \leqslant n \Delta+\frac{16 k \log (n)}{\Delta}+3 \sum_{i} \Delta_{i} \\ & \leqslant 8 \sqrt{n k \log (n)}+3 \sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i}, \end{aligned} Rn​​=i=1∑k​Δi​E[Ti​(n)]=i:Δi​<Δ∑​Δi​E[Ti​(n)]+i:Δi​⩾Δ∑​Δi​E[Ti​(n)]⩽nΔ+i:Δi​⩾Δ∑​(3Δi​+Δi​16log(n)​)⩽nΔ+Δ16klog(n)​+3i∑​Δi​⩽8nklog(n)​+3i=1∑k​Δi​,​

entry.title: ETC Algorithm
entry.content:
Regret定义

n轮游戏，参与者每次选择一个action，获取reward。参与者每次选择action时都要参考之前的reward，来使n轮的reward累积最大化，或者是让regret最小化，regret的定义为：

Rn=nmax⁡a∈Aμa−E[∑t=1nXt]R_{n}=n \max _{a \in \mathcal{A}} \mu_{a}-\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{t=1}^{n} X_{t}\right] Rn​=na∈Amax​μa​−E[t=1∑n​Xt​]

算法

At={(t mod k)+1 if t⩽mkargmaxi μ^i(mk) if t>mkA_{t}= \begin{cases}(t\bmod k)+1 & \text { if } t \leqslant mk \\ \text{argmax}_{i}~\hat{\mu}_{i}(mk) & \text { if } t > mk \\ \end{cases} At​={(tmodk)+1argmaxi​ μ^​i​(mk)​ if t⩽mk if t>mk​

引理一

引入

Ta=∑t=1nX{At=a},Δa=μ∗−μaT_{a}=\sum_{t=1}^{n}\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\},\quad\Delta_{a}=\mu^{*}-\mu_{a} Ta​=t=1∑n​X{At​=a},Δa​=μ∗−μa​

可以将regret函数改写成

Rn=∑a∈A∑t=1nE[(μ∗−Xt)X{At=a}]=∑a∈A∑t=1nX{At=a}Δa=∑a∈AΔaE(Ta(n))\begin{aligned} R_{n}&=\sum_{a\in \mathcal{A}}\sum_{t=1}^{n}\mathbb{E}\left[(\mu^{*}-X_{t})\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}\right]\\ &=\sum_{a\in \mathcal{A}}\sum_{t=1}^{n}\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}\Delta_{a}\\ &=\sum_{a\in \mathcal{A}}\Delta_{a}E(T_{a}(n)) \end{aligned} Rn​​=a∈A∑​t=1∑n​E[(μ∗−Xt​)X{At​=a}]=a∈A∑​t=1∑n​X{At​=a}Δa​=a∈A∑​Δa​E(Ta​(n))​

对于上式的第二步的处理，需要考虑条件期望

E[(μ∗−Xt)X{At=a}∣At]=X{At=a}E[(μ∗−Xt)∣At]=X{At=a}(μ∗−μa)=X{At=a}Δa\begin{aligned} &E\left[(\mu^{*}-X_{t})\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}\right|A_{t}]\\ =&\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}\mathbb{E}\left[(\mu^{*}-X_{t})|A_{t}\right]\\ =&\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}(\mu^{*}-\mu_{a})\\ =&\mathcal{X}\{A_{t}=a\}\Delta_{a} \end{aligned} ===​E[(μ∗−Xt​)X{At​=a}∣At​]X{At​=a}E[(μ∗−Xt​)∣At​]X{At​=a}(μ∗−μa​)X{At​=a}Δa​​

引理二

对于XXX服从σ−subgaussian\sigma-\text{subgaussian}σ−subgaussian分布，有

P(X⩾ϵ)⩽e−2ϵλσ2\mathbb{P}(X\geqslant\epsilon) \leqslant e^{-\frac{2\epsilon}{\lambda\sigma^2}} P(X⩾ϵ)⩽e−λσ22ϵ​

亚高斯分布定义：

∀λ∈RE(eλx)⩽eλ2σ22\forall \lambda\in R\quad \mathbb{E}(e^{\lambda x})\leqslant e^{\frac{\lambda^2\sigma^2}{2}} ∀λ∈RE(eλx)⩽e2λ2σ2​

对于∀λ>0\forall \lambda>0∀λ>0，

P(X⩾ϵ)=P(eλX⩾eλϵ)⩽E(eλX)eλϵ(Markov’s inequality)⩽eλ2σ22λϵ(Def. of subgaussianity)⩽e−2ϵλσ2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{P}(X\geqslant\epsilon)&=\mathbb{P}(e^{\lambda X}\geqslant e^{\lambda\epsilon})\\ &\leqslant \frac{\mathbb{E}(e^{\lambda X})}{e^{\lambda\epsilon}} \quad(\text{Markov's inequality})\\ &\leqslant e^{\frac{\lambda^2\sigma^2}{2\lambda\epsilon}}\quad(\text{Def. of subgaussianity})\\ &\leqslant e^{-\frac{2\epsilon}{\lambda\sigma^2}} \end{aligned} P(X⩾ϵ)​=P(eλX⩾eλϵ)⩽eλϵE(eλX)​(Markov’s inequality)⩽e2λϵλ2σ2​(Def. of subgaussianity)⩽e−λσ22ϵ​​

取λ=4ϵ\lambda=\frac{4}{\epsilon}λ=ϵ4​，即可得到

引理三

对于XXX服从σ−subgaussian\sigma-\text{subgaussian}σ−subgaussian分布

E(X)=0,V(X)≤σ2,cX∼∣c∣⋅σ−subguassian\mathbb{E}(X)=0, \quad \mathbb{V}(X) \leq \sigma^{2},\quad cX \sim |c|\cdot \sigma-\text{subguassian} E(X)=0,V(X)≤σ2,cX∼∣c∣⋅σ−subguassian

X1,X1X_{1},X_{1}X1​,X1​独立，服从σ1−subgaussian\sigma_{1}-\text{subgaussian}σ1​−subgaussian和σ2−subgaussian\sigma_{2}-\text{subgaussian}σ2​−subgaussian分布

X1+X2∼σ12+σ22−subguassianX_{1}+X_{2} \sim \sqrt{\sigma_{1}^2+\sigma_{2}^2}-\text{subguassian} X1​+X2​∼σ12​+σ22​​−subguassian

对于Xi−μX_{i}-\muXi​−μ服从σ−subgaussian\sigma-\text{subgaussian}σ−subgaussian分布

P(μ^⩾μ+ϵ)⩽e−nϵ22σ2\mathbb{P}(\hat{\mu}\geqslant \mu+\epsilon)\leqslant e^{-\frac{n\epsilon^2}{2\sigma^2}} P(μ^​⩾μ+ϵ)⩽e−2σ2nϵ2​

P(μ^−μ⩾ϵ)=P(1n∑i=1n(Xi−μ)⩾ϵ)⩽e−ϵ22nσ2\begin{aligned} &\mathbb{P}(\hat{\mu}-\mu\geqslant \epsilon)\\ =&\mathbb{P}(\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_{i}-\mu)\geqslant\epsilon)\\ \leqslant &e^{-\frac{\epsilon^2}{2}\frac{n}{\sigma^2}} \end{aligned} =⩽​P(μ^​−μ⩾ϵ)P(n1​i=1∑n​(Xi​−μ)⩾ϵ)e−2ϵ2​σ2n​​

对于上式的最后一步的处理，需要考虑

1n∑i=1n(Xi−μ)∼nσ2n−subguassian\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_{i}-\mu)\sim \frac{\sqrt{n\sigma^2}}{n}-\text{subguassian} n1​i=1∑n​(Xi​−μ)∼nnσ2​​−subguassian

Regret分析

Rn⩽m∑i=1kΔi+(n−mk)∑i=1kΔiexp⁡(−mΔi24)R_{n} \leqslant m \sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i}+(n-m k) \sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i} \exp \left(-\frac{m \Delta_{i}^{2}}{4}\right) Rn​⩽mi=1∑k​Δi​+(n−mk)i=1∑k​Δi​exp(−4mΔi2​​)

假设 μ1=μ∗\mu_{1}=\mu^{*}μ1​=μ∗，根据引理一

Rn=∑i=1kΔiE[Ti(n)]R_{n}=\sum_{i=1}^{k} \Delta_{i} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] Rn​=i=1∑k​Δi​E[Ti​(n)]

前mk轮选择一定

E[Ti(n)]=m+(n−mk)P(Amk+1=i)⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^i(mk)⩾max⁡j≠iμ^j(mk))⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^i(mk)⩾μ^1(mk))⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^i(mk)−μi−(μ^1(mk)−μ1)⩾Δi)⩽m+(n−mk)exp⁡(−mΔi24)\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}\left[T_{i}(n)\right] &=m+(n-m k) \mathbb{P}\left(A_{m k+1}=i\right) \\ & \leqslant m+(n-m k) \mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i}(m k) \geqslant \max _{j \neq i} \hat{\mu}_{j}(m k)\right)\\ & \leqslant m+(n-m k)\mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i}(m k) \geqslant \hat{\mu}_{1}(m k)\right) \\ & \leqslant m+(n-m k)\mathbb{P}\left(\hat{\mu}_{i}(m k)-\mu_{i}-\left(\hat{\mu}_{1}(m k)-\mu_{1}\right) \geqslant \Delta_{i}\right)\\ & \leqslant m+(n-m k)\exp \left(-\frac{m \Delta_{i}^{2}}{4}\right) \end{aligned} E[Ti​(n)]​=m+(n−mk)P(Amk+1​=i)⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^​i​(mk)⩾j​=imax​μ^​j​(mk))⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^​i​(mk)⩾μ^​1​(mk))⩽m+(n−mk)P(μ^​i​(mk)−μi​−(μ^​1​(mk)−μ1​)⩾Δi​)⩽m+(n−mk)exp(−4mΔi2​​)​

对于上式的最后一步的处理，需要考虑引理三及

μ^i(mk)−μi−(μ^1(mk)−μ1)∼1m+1m−subguassian\hat{\mu}_{i}(m k)-\mu_{i}-(\hat{\mu}_{1}(m k)-\mu_{1})\sim \sqrt{\frac{1}{m}+\frac{1}{m}}-\text{subguassian} μ^​i​(mk)−μi​−(μ^​1​(mk)−μ1​)∼m1​+m1​​−subguassian

如果k=2

Rn⩽mΔ+(n−2m)Δexp⁡(−mΔ24)⩽mΔ+nΔexp⁡(−mΔ24)R_{n} \leqslant m \Delta+(n-2 m) \Delta \exp \left(-\frac{m \Delta^{2}}{4}\right) \leqslant m \Delta+n \Delta \exp \left(-\frac{m \Delta^{2}}{4}\right) Rn​⩽mΔ+(n−2m)Δexp(−4mΔ2​)⩽mΔ+nΔexp(−4mΔ2​)

给出一个m的选取

m=max⁡{1,⌈4Δ2log⁡(nΔ24)]}m=\max \left\{1,\left\lceil\frac{4}{\Delta^{2}} \log \left(\frac{n \Delta^{2}}{4}\right)\right]\right\} m=max{1,⌈Δ24​log(4nΔ2​)]}

Regret的上界为

Rn⩽min⁡{nΔ,Δ+4Δ(1+max⁡{0,log⁡(nΔ24)})}Rn⩽Δ+CnR_{n} \leqslant \min \left\{n \Delta, \Delta+\frac{4}{\Delta}\left(1+\max \left\{0, \log \left(\frac{n \Delta^{2}}{4}\right)\right\}\right)\right\}\\ R_{n} \leqslant \Delta+C \sqrt{n} Rn​⩽min{nΔ,Δ+Δ4​(1+max{0,log(4nΔ2​)})}Rn​⩽Δ+Cn​
